title: Review Software License Compliance
description: An IT auditor checks if the company is compliant with its software licensing agreements.

tasks.description: Obtain a report of all installed software from the IT asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has a list of all software installed on company devices.

tasks.description: Obtain the purchase records for software licenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has a list of all licenses the company owns.

tasks.description: Compare the number of installations for a specific software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop) to the number of licenses purchased.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor finds there are 150 installations but only 120 licenses, indicating a compliance gap.
